original: 左馮翊頻陽人，游楚之父。與張既為忘年交，極為賞識張既，更將兒子託付張既。後因與胡軫不合，約在李郭亂政時期，被胡軫所害。
text: Zuo Fengyi Pinyang, father of You Chu. It was a year-end acquaintance with Zhang Ji, he greatly appreciated Zhang Ji, and entrusted his son to Zhang Ji. Later, because of disagreement with Hu Zhen, he was victimized by Hu Zhen during Li Guo's rebellion.
